text: tbl tibble data.frame. method text. Method use: "mecab", "ginza", "sudachi_a", "sudachi_b", "sudachi_c", "chamame". "", "b" "c" specify mode splitting. text: df dataframe including result morphological analysis. draw logical. ... Extra arguments internal functions. group string specify sentence. depend logical. term_depend string dependent terms column use bigram. bigram result bigram(). rand_seed numeric. threshold numeric used threshold frequency bigram. big_net result bigram_network(). freq numeric word frequency bigram_network. Can got using word_freq(). arrow_size, circle_size, text_size, numeric. font_family string. arrow_col, circle_col string specify arrow circle color bigram network. x_limits, y_limits Pair numeric specify range. no_scale logical. FALSE: draw x y axis.

title: Draw bigram network using morphological analysis data. — draw_bigram_network
code: sentences <- 50 len <- 30 n <- sentences * len x <- letters prob <- (length(x):1) ^ 3 df <-    tibble::tibble(     lemma = sample(x = x, size = n, replace = TRUE, prob = prob),     sentence = rep(seq(sentences), each = len)) draw_bigram_network(df)  #> $df #> # A tibble: 1,500 × 2 #>    lemma sentence #>    <chr>    <int> #>  1 a            1 #>  2 j            1 #>  3 f            1 #>  4 b            1 #>  5 a            1 #>  6 d            1 #>  7 e            1 #>  8 c            1 #>  9 h            1 #> 10 i            1 #> # ℹ 1,490 more rows #>  #> $bigram #> # A tibble: 264 × 3 #>    word_1 word_2  freq #>    <chr>  <chr>  <int> #>  1 b      a         25 #>  2 a      c         22 #>  3 b      d         21 #>  4 e      b         21 #>  5 d      b         20 #>  6 a      a         19 #>  7 b      g         19 #>  8 a      b         18 #>  9 b      c         18 #> 10 c      b         18 #> # ℹ 254 more rows #>  #> $freq #>  [1] 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10  8  8  8  8  6  6 #>  #> $gg  #>

title: Morphological analysis for a specific column in dataframe — moranajp_all
text: tbl tibble data.frame. bin_dir text. Directory mecab. method text. Method use: "mecab", "ginza", "sudachi_a", "sudachi_b", "sudachi_c", "chamame". "", "b" "c" specify mode splitting. "" split shortest, "b" middle "c" longest. See https://github.com/WorksApplications/Sudachi detail. "chamame" use https://chamame.ninjal.ac.jp/ rvest. text_col text. Colnames morphological analysis. option text. Options mecab. "-b" option already set moranajp. see option, use "mecab -h" command (win) terminal (Mac). iconv text. Convert encoding MeCab output. Default (""): convert. "CP932_UTF-8": iconv(output, = "Shift-JIS" = "UTF-8") "EUC_UTF-8"  : iconv(output, = "eucjp", = "UTF-8") iconv also used convert input text running MeCab. "CP932_UTF-8": iconv(input, =  "UTF-8", = "Shift-JIS") col_lang text. "jp" "en" brk string break point
